name: 幼兒讀寫研究
description: Topics covered in this course include literacy development, Literacy and oral language, emergent literacy, literacy instructional strategies, home and school support, literacy assessment, intervention, etc.
goals: introduce literacy development in young children
examine approaches to beginning literacy instruction
explore the implications of theory and research
syllabus:
Literacy development: Framework of theory and research  
Literacy development and reading process  
Literacy and oral language  
Emergent literacy  
Strands of literacy development (1): Phonological awareness  
Strands of literacy development (2): Radicals and morphological awareness  
Strands of literacy development (3): comprehension  
Strands of literacy development (4): Writing, spelling, and orthographic skills  
Home-school support  
Children with special needs  
Intervention  
Literacy assessment  
lectures, class discussion, oral presentation
